meaningMnemonic: When something is in the <kanji>middle</kanji> of an action but it's <kanji>stop</kanji>ped, this means it's put into <vocabulary>suspension</vocabulary>. Imagine getting frozen while you're running. It's kind of like that.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
